## buildFilterPredicate() function

Builds a predicate that evaluates whether a row passes all active filters.

**Signature:**

```typescript
buildFilterPredicate: <TRow = AnyRow>(ctx: FilterContext<TRow>) => ((row: TRow) => boolean)
```
